eu.cqse.check.base

Class UnwantedExpressionInCommentCheckBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.core.CheckImplementationBase
      • eu.cqse.check.base.CommentCheckBase
        • eu.cqse.check.base.UnwantedExpressionInCommentCheckBase

  • public abstract class UnwantedExpressionInCommentCheckBase
extends CommentCheckBase
    Base class for checks which find unwanted expressions in any comment in a resource.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnwantedExpressionInCommentCheckBase

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws CheckException
        Initializes the custom check. This is called after the parameters have been set, but before the check is executed and before the context is set. This method is called only once for a batch of files that need to be analyzed. Since the context is file-specific it can't be accessed here. This method is intended for preprocessing or parsing of the parameters.
        Overrides:
        initialize in class CheckImplementationBase
        Throws:
        CheckException - can be thrown by subclasses

      • processComment

        protected void processComment(IToken token,
                              int startLine,
                              int endLine)
                       throws CheckException
        When implemented in a subclass, processes the specified comment token, which runs from the provided start line to the provided end line.
        Specified by:
        processComment in class CommentCheckBase
        Parameters:
        token - the comment token to process
        startLine - the 1-based start line of the comment token in the analyzed resource.
        endLine - the 1-based end line of the comment token in the analyzed resource.
        Throws:
        CheckException

      • getUnwantedRegex

        protected abstract java.util.regex.Pattern getUnwantedRegex()
        Provides the Regex pattern that specifies which expressions are unwanted in comments. Note that this method is only called once at the initialization of the check for performance reasons.

      • getFindingText

        protected abstract java.lang.String getFindingText(IToken token,
                                                   java.util.regex.MatchResult matchResult)
        Gets the text for the finding.
        Parameters:
        token - The token where the unwanted pattern was found.
        matchResult - The MatchResult which allows providing more details in the findings text.
        Returns:
        The finding text.
